bwwExcerpt: Holden performs with perfect poise, true vocal technique and an appealing, steely edge...But, at the end of the day, it all feels a bit, well, small and childish in the Theatre Royal Drury Lane, this famous bastion of the greatest musical theatre of our time, especially with a tacked-on feelgood finale (as in the movie) of the Monkees' "I'm a Believer", which, in live performance, exerts a karaoke effect to finish the night.
